title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 649 - Taxes On Mortgages On Property Situated Partly Within And Partly Without The State
content:

State Regulations

§ 649.2 - Procedures for recording

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. D, pt. 649

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
